channel.title: Jad Walk, run, and stand anim ids?

item.title: Jad Walk, run, and stand anim ids?
item.dc:creator: @dadancinman dadancinman
item.description:
@dadancinman wrote:

Okay, so i am making it so when you wield a glowing dagger, you turn into Jad, with proper running, walking, standing, blocking, and attacking animations.

So i looked through NPChandler, and found only the attack and blocking animation IDs.

Anyone have the walk, run, and stand IDs…?

Here’s an example for the walk animation ID for veracs flail.

if (id == 4755) // veracs flail { return 2060; }

So mine for the jad walk anim would look like this:

if (id == 747) // Glowie Dag { return ####; // --Jad walk anim ID here. }

So ya, thanks in advance. =[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 31, 2008, 06:53:20 pm[/size][hr]MOPARSCAPE.ORG SUCKS ASS! I posted this question on R-server aswell, got answers right away. fuck moparisthebest.com.

Read full topic
